channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- QRadar SIEM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- QRadar SIEM

item.title: CVE-2020-4364|2024-09-17T01:21:47.676Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 178961.

item.title: CVE-2021-20337|2024-09-17T00:35:53.266Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3.0 to 7.3.3 Patch 8 and 7.4.0 to 7.4.3 GA uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 194448.

item.title: CVE-2020-4511|2024-09-17T01:05:53.154Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service of the qflow process by sending a malformed sflow command. IBM X-Force ID: 182366.

item.title: CVE-2021-38878|2024-09-17T00:36:18.841Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 could allow a malicious actor to impersonate an actor due to key exchange without entity authentication. IBM X-Force ID: 208756.

item.title: CVE-2021-29849|2024-09-17T00:25:54.131Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 205281.

item.title: CVE-2021-29880|2024-09-17T00:11:34.583Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.4.3 GA - 7.4.3 Fix Pack 1 when using domains or multi-tenancy could be vulnerable to information disclosure between tenants by routing SIEM data to the incorrect domain. IBM X-Force ID: 206979.

item.title: CVE-2021-38869|2024-09-17T00:16:07.916Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 in some situations may not automatically log users out after they exceede their idle timeout. IBM X-Force ID: 208341.

item.title: CVE-2017-1622|2024-09-17T00:31:28.758Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2.8 and 7.3 does not validate, or incorrectly validates, a certificate. This weakness might allow an attacker to spoof a trusted entity by using a man-in-the-middle (MITM) attack. IBM X-force ID: 133120.

item.title: CVE-2018-2022|2024-09-17T01:51:30.644Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 discloses sensitive information to unauthorized users. The information can be used to mount further attacks on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 155346.

item.title: CVE-2020-4513|2024-09-17T01:00:34.658Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3 and 7.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 182368.

item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.2 and 7.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. IBM X-Force ID: 147707.

item.title: CVE-2023-50961|2024-08-02T22:23:44.133Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 275939.

item.title: CVE-2023-50949|2024-08-02T22:23:44.080Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow an unauthorized user to perform unauthorized actions due to improper certificate validation. IBM X-Force ID: 275706.

item.title: CVE-2024-27269|2024-06-04T17:47:00.230Z -- ibm -- qradar%20siem
item.description: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5 could allow a privileged user to configure user management that would disclose unintended sensitive information across tenants. IBM X-Force ID: 284575.
